About Us

25+ Years of Sugar Excellence

From the fertile soils of Brazil to tables around the world, we've been crafting premium sugar products that meet the highest international standards. Our commitment to quality, sustainability, and customer satisfaction has made us a global leader in sugar manufacturing and export.

Our Premium Products

Discover our comprehensive range of high-quality sugar products

ICUMSA 45
refined
ICUMSA 45 White Refined Sugar
The highest quality refined sugar available in the global market. Known for its pure white color, fine granulation, and exceptional sweetness.
  • Pure white color
  • Fine granulation
  • Highest quality standard
ICUMSA 100
refined
ICUMSA 100 Cane Sugar
Premium quality cane sugar with excellent color and taste characteristics, perfect for various industrial applications.
  • Light golden color
  • Rich flavor profile
  • High sucrose content
ICUMSA 150
refined
ICUMSA 150 Cane Sugar
High-quality cane sugar with a slightly darker color, offering excellent sweetness and natural flavor.
  • Golden color
  • Natural sweetness
  • Premium quality
ICUMSA 600-1200
raw
ICUMSA 600-1200 Cane Sugar
Raw cane sugar with a rich, natural flavor and distinctive brown color, ideal for specialty applications.
  • Brown color
  • Rich molasses flavor
  • Natural nutrients
refined
Fine Crystal Sugar
Precisely refined sugar with fine crystal structure, perfect for baking and confectionery applications.
  • Fine crystal structure
  • Quick dissolving
  • Perfect for baking
refined
Extra Fine Crystal Sugar
Ultra-fine refined sugar with exceptional dissolving properties, ideal for premium applications.
  • Ultra-fine crystals
  • Instant dissolving
  • Premium applications
specialty
Big Granulated Sugar
Large crystal sugar with excellent flow properties, perfect for industrial and food service applications.
  • Large crystals
  • Excellent flow
  • Industrial grade
specialty
Sugar Powder
Finely ground sugar perfect for confectionery, icing, and decorative applications.
  • Fine powder texture
  • Quick mixing
  • Perfect for icing
